meta.description: Optimize the distribution of products to retail and factory outlet stores to minimize the number of stores open while meeting customer and employee constraints.

sets.name: STORE_TYPES
sets.description: Types of stores where products can be distributed.

params.name: customers_per_store
params.description: Number of customers each store type brings in per day.

params.name: employees_per_store
params.description: Number of employees required to operate each store type.

params.name: min_customers
params.description: Minimum number of customers required per day.

vars.name: open_stores
vars.description: Number of stores of each type that are open.

objective.name: minimize_open_stores
objective.description: Minimize the total number of stores that must be open.

constraints.name: customer_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least the minimum number of customers are served per day.

constraints.name: employee_limit
constraints.description: Ensure the number of employees does not exceed the available limit.
